title: The Best Nordstrom Anniversary Sale Home Deals to Grab Before They’re Gone
description: Upgrade your space with these major markdowns.
excerpt: Upgrade your space with these major markdowns.

html:
The Perfect Gift

Diptyque Iconic Candle Gift Set

These candles emit a delightful fragrance that transforms any room into a tranquil retreat. They also make a great gift due to their elegant packaging. This offer is exclusive to the Anniversary Sale, so don’t miss out.

The Frizz-Defeating Pillowcase

BLISSY Mulberry Silk Pillowcase

If you haven’t made the switch to a silk pillowcase yet, now is the best time to do so. This one is crafted from genuine mulberry silk and priced under $60. Your skin and hair will thank you later.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Must-Have Vacuum

Dyson V15 Detect Pro Cordless Vacuum

This lightweight Dyson vacuum has been a total game changer for me—no more wrestling with bulky cords or dragging a heavy machine up the stairs. With up to 120 minutes of run time and a bonus filter included, this deal is too good to miss.

The Aesthetic Air Fryer

Our Place Large Wonder Oven

Now this is an air fryer I’d actually want to leave out on the countertop. How gorgeous is this inky blue shade? I’ll never stop singing the praises of these versatile convection ovens—they’re my all-time favorite kitchen appliance and the ultimate timesaver.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Dream Duvet Insert

Sijo AiryWeight Eucalyptus Comforter

Say goodbye to night sweats with this naturally cooling eucalyptus comforter. The name says it all—it’s ultralight, making it perfect for year-round use. Use it on its own in the summer, and layer it with a blanket when the temperatures drop.

The Cozy Throw

Barefoot Dreams CozyChic Rib Throw Blanket

Need an extra throw for your office chair, recliner, or guest bed? Barefoot Dreams makes some of the softest blankets available. This one, in a calming gray shade, is seriously marked down for the Anniversary Sale.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Heirloom Cookware

Le Creuset Traditional 4.5-Quart Enamel Cast Iron Oval Dutch Oven

These look effortlessly elegant on the stovetop and are incredibly practical for cooking large portions. I use mine for just about everything—soups, stews, roasts, you name it.

The Quilted Comforter

Parachute Cozy Quilted Organic Cotton Comforter

Talk about plush. This quilted comforter in a cool evergreen hue instantly elevates your bedroom and is perfect for cozying up during movie nights.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Softest Duvet Cover

Parachute Soft Luxe Organic Cotton Sateen Duvet Cover

If you’re looking for a cover to pair with your insert, I can’t recommend sateen enough. It makes every night feel like you’re sleeping in a luxurious hotel bed.

The Statement Vase

Osmos Studio Purple Iris Vase

Add a pop of color to any bookshelf or nook with this beautiful sculptural vase. Style it alongside your favorite books or fill it with a fresh bouquet of flowers.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

All the Cookware You Need

Viking 3 Ply 17 Piece Stainless Steel Cookware Set

This is it: The ultimate cookware set. You’ll wonder why you didn’t make the switch sooner. I’ve already replaced all my Teflon with stainless steel, and I couldn’t be happier.

The Concentrated Detergent

L’AVANT Collective Fresh Linen Laundry Detergent

If you’ve never tried a designer detergent or heard of this cult-favorite brand, this sale is the perfect excuse to start. The dreamy scent alone will have you actually looking forward to laundry day. Use it to make your entire closet smell amazing—or reserve it for blankets and bedding.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Ultimate Knife Block

Viking 14 Piece German Steel Knife Block Set

This might be one of the best deals yet—a 14-piece knife block at $100 off is a serious steal. If you’ve got dull knives rusting away in a kitchen drawer, consider this your sign to upgrade.

Spa-Quality Towels

Matouk Regent 6-Piece Towel Set

Treat yourself to ultra-soft, high-quality towels that make drying off after a shower feel like wrapping yourself in a cloud. Plus, the crisp white color is easy to bleach, so keeping them fresh and bright is effortless.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Chicest Placemats

Siafu Home Mistari Striped Placemats Set of 4

A charming addition to any table setting, these vibrant placemats will instantly elevate your dinner to gourmet status. They also make a thoughtful gift for anyone who loves to host.

The Unique Candle Set

APOTHEKE Fragrance Discovery Mini Candle Set

New to APOTHEKE’s divine scents? This discovery set is the perfect introduction—and at under $50, it’s a no-brainer. With a mini candle for every room, you can fill your entire space with enchanting aromas.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Dazzling Drinkware

Viski Reserve Milo Crystal Highball Glasses

Just imagine these stunning lead-free pieces lined up on your bar—perfect for mojitos, gin and tonics, and more. They’ll make your homemade cocktails look like they belong in an exclusive members-only club.

Organize in Style

Le Creuset Large Stoneware Utensil Crock

I absolutely adore Le Creuset’s Caribbean shade—it’s bold, vibrant, and instantly evokes the feeling of summer. Fill this container with your everyday cooking utensils for a stylish, functional countertop upgrade.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Neutral Tablecloth

Mungo Linen Cloverleaf Tablecloth

For an elegant dining setup, consider this airy linen tablecloth from Mungo. Featuring a subtle cloverleaf pattern and a delicate picot stitch, its neutral hue makes it an easy match with any serveware.

For Soft Hands

L’AVANT Collective Hand Care 2 Piece Box Set

Another standout from L’AVANT Collective, this hotel-quality hand soap and lotion set is a chic, luxurious addition to any bathroom or counter.
